DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate relationship smoke rate , gender , body weight Hispanic Health Nutrition Examination I Survey ( HHANES ) I . Also , evaluate independent additive contribution smoke rate fast glucose body weight HHANES I NHANES II .
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : The study support Small Grants Program establish National Heart , Lung , Blood Institute January 1990 provide limit support extend analyse research data generate clinical trial , population research , demonstration education research study . DESIGN NARRATIVE : The first study use HHANES I data analysis variance determine possible body composition difference subgroups gender smoking category . Caloric difference dietary intake analyzed second ANOVA design . The second study use data HHANES I NHANES II evaluate independent additive synergistic contribution smoke rate fast glucose body weight .
